data.text: Nkɔmhyɛ a ɛfa Babilonia, anweatam no a ɛda Po no ho:
Wɔde anisoadehunu a ɛyɛ nwanwa akyerɛ me:
Yei ama ɔyea bi abɛhyɛ me mu,
Yei ne deɛ Awurade ka kyerɛ me:
Hwɛ, ɔbarima bi a ɔte teaseɛnam mu na ɔreba yi
Ao, me nkurɔfoɔ a wɔadwera mo wɔ ayuporeeɛ ase
Momfa nsuo mmrɛ wɔn a sukɔm de wɔn;
Yei ne deɛ Awurade ka kyerɛ me, “Afe baako mu no, sɛdeɛ wɔkan ɔpaani mfeɛ no, Kedar kɛseyɛ to bɛtwa.
Na agyantofoɔ a wɔbɛka ne Kedar akofoɔ bɛyɛ kakraa bi.” Deɛ Awurade, Israel Onyankopɔn, aka nie.
